org.webharvest.runtime.templaters
Class BaseTemplater

java.lang.Object
  org.webharvest.runtime.templaters.BaseTemplater

public class BaseTemplater
extends java.lang.Object

Simple templater - replaces ${expression} sequences in string with evaluated expressions. Specified script engine is used for evaluation.
